{{Description|"Thoma takes to new life skills like a fish to water. After arriving in Inazuma, he quickly learned how to partake of the bountiful blessings found in the nation's waters."|2=[[Dainsleif]] in [https://youtu.be/tujjklS7LD4 Collected Miscellany - "Thoma: Crimson Armor of Loyalty"]}}
'''Snap and Swing''' is [[Thoma]]'s [[Utility Passive]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* If this talent activates when an [[Ornamental Fish]] is caught, the player will receive an additional Ornamental Fish.
* Any bonus fish caught are not counted towards the [[Ding Ding Ding! (Tier 3)|Ding Ding Ding!]] [[achievement]] to catch a total of 2,000 fish.
** Additionally, said bonus fish are not kept track of in the [[archive]].
* {{Talent Note|character=Thoma|talent=Snap and Swing|no party}}
* In [[Co-Op Mode]], only the players who own Thoma are able to use the passive.
